title: Smart Money Podcast: Building Your Financial Smarts With Bola Sokunbi - Waco Tribune-Herald
content: Smart Money Podcast: Building Your Financial Smarts With Bola Sokunbi  Waco Tribune-Herald
description: Welcome to NerdWallet’s Smart Money podcast, where we usually answer your real-world money questions. This week’s episode is dedicated to a conversation with Bola Sokunbi, a financial educator and author.…
